markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Laminar](/Traits.aspx?ID=482)</title>

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 220 <sup>2.0</sup>

The armor is made up of layered sections, so when it breaks, it isn't as much of a problem. The status penalty to AC if this armor is [broken](/Conditions.aspx?ID=2) is –1 for broken medium armor, –2 for broken heavy armor, or no penalty for broken light armor.
name: Laminar
